import React, { useContext, useState } from 'react' import Button from 'react-bootstrap/Button'; import Form from 'react-bootstrap/Form'; import NoticeContext from "../../context/notices/NoticeContext" export default function AddNote() { const context = useContext(NoticeContext); const {addNotice} = context; const [notice,setNotice] = useState const onchange = ()=>{ } return ( <>
Title Title must be longer than 10 letters Notice Notice must be longer than 10 letters.
) }
